tool_description: Analyzes customer data to create meaningful segments based on demographics, behavior, and value characteristics for targeted pricing strategies.

customer_ids.description: Array of validated customer IDs to segment

segmentation_method.description: Segmentation approach: demographic, behavioral, value_based, psychographic, geographic

number_of_segments.description: Target number of customer segments to create (2-20)

segmentation_features.description: Features to use for segmentation analysis

minimum_segment_size.description: Minimum number of customers per segment

error_messages: Insufficient customer data: Provide at least 10 customer IDs for meaningful segmentation.
Invalid segmentation method: Use one of [demographic, behavioral, value_based, psychographic, geographic].
Invalid segment count: number_of_segments must be between 2 and 20.
Too few features: Provide at least 2 segmentation features.
Invalid time period: analysis_period_days must be between 30 and 730.
Segment size too small: minimum_segment_size should be at least 10.
usage: Provide customer_ids, segmentation_method, number_of_segments, and segmentation_features. Optionally specify minimum_segment_size and analysis_period_days. Returns customer segments with characteristics and profiles.

segment_profiles.description: Detailed characteristics and profiles for each segment

customer_segment_mapping.description: Mapping of customer IDs to their assigned segments
